title: Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis & polio vaccination
author: Central-Apotheke Thalwil AG
description: At Central Apotheke Thalwil you can have your diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis and poliomyelitis vaccinations carried out quickly and easily.
cleaned_text: Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis & polio vaccination - At Central Apotheke Thalwil you can have your diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis and poliomyelitis vaccinations carried out quickly and easily. - The vaccination only takes about 15 minutes. For most vaccinations you no longer need to visit your doctor, but can also get it conveniently at our Central Apotheke Thalwil. Let us protect you against - Diphtheria - Tetanus - Pertussis - Poliomyelitis Only over 16-year-olds can be vaccinated at the pharmacy. Your time commitment: 15 minutes Costs Vaccination Service: CHF 25.00, including documentation, administration and entry in the vaccination card. Costs vaccine: - Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis: CHF 36.25 (DTP vaccine) - Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis, vaccine) Registration Pre-registration is required for the vaccinations via online booking tool,
